text:
Madeline Roth madfitzroth 33m ago 
Chance the Rapper is fresh off a historic night at Sundayâ€™s Grammys , where he took home three awards (his first ones ever!): Best New Artist, Best Rap Album, and Best Rap Performance. Chance already shared the congratulatory text he received from Drake, and now heâ€™s revealed what Kendrick Lamar said to him as well. 
â€œCongrats bro. God is moving!â€ Kendrick wrote, prompting Chano to reply, â€œHe is! Love u brother! Thanks for always taking care of us.â€ The Coloring Book rapper captioned the post, â€œBig Brother ğŸ’¯ğŸ’¯.â€ 
We can learn a lot from this screenshot, such as: 1) Chance has 449 unread messages, which is frankly just stressful, 2) Lamarâ€™s number is saved in Chanceâ€™s phone as â€œKendrick New Numberâ€ for some reason, 3) their last text exchange was in December, when Lamar sent another kind message, 4) Chanceâ€™s recently used emojis include the nerd face and the bucket of popcorn, and 5) Lamar awesomely signs off as â€œkdot.â€ Very useful info, no? 
The Compton MC wasnâ€™t in attendance at last nightâ€™s ceremony, but he was definitely tuned in. TDE co-president Terrence â€œPunchâ€ Henderson tweeted that he spoke to Lamar about the Grammys, and that the rapper was upset that Adele won Album of the Year over BeyoncÃ©. He's definitely not alone .
